name: Chaos In Space (TR06)
description: Aliens have taken over space stations set in different planets. It is your job as an astronaut to recapture them. There are 10 different stations you have to recapture. You can use the arrow keys to move, the space bar to jump, and the R button to shoot bullets. You will have a limited amount of bullets and lives per level. You can get points by collection coins or defeating enemy aliens. Good luck on your expedition!
